Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/65th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted NB: King Drive, 67th, State, 61st and King Drive; SB: King Drive, 61st, Indiana, 60th, State, 67th and King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near King Drive/65th, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 67th, State, 61st and King Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 61st, Indiana, 60th, State, 67th and King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
